# error

**Instance Property**

Returns the error event.

## Declaration

```swift
var error: any Error { get }
```

## Getting the error

- **didRecover**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the error was recoverable.

items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the error was recoverable.
